context: Do you know any movies that are like the Dark Knight?
Sure. Christopher Nolan directed it and he also directed The Dark Knight Rises, Memento, and Inception
What genre of movie is Inception and who starred in it?
resp: Inception has many genres including Thriller, Science Fiction Sci-Fi, Mystery, Blockbuster, Adventure and Action. Leonardo DiCaprio stars in the film
